name: Escape Glompo
description:
Get Glomped by the Glompo or send him to the Swampo. In this critically appraised Thriller Survival Experience, your goal is to find the key and escape Glompo's wrath by whatever means necessary. Glompo may always be behind you [Winking Emoji] but if you can shut the door in his face, you'll prevail... for now.

Controls:
WASD/Arrow keys - move
Mouse - Look
Shift - Sprint
Space - Jump
E - Pickup key
